Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Cesar Ramirez
Reviews.Content: The Nikon  D 7000 is the best camera to start as a beginner as a photographer, Very good one. I love it

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D7000 16.2MP DX-Format CMOS Digital SLR with 3.0-Inch LCD
Combination of 16.2MP CMOS image sensor and Nikon's new EXPEED 2 image processing system delivers briliiant image quality with low noise level.
Captures breathtaking full 1080p HD movies with full-time autofocus and manual exposure control using the D-Movie function. To keep critical HD focus, users can choose to engage a variety of AF functions.
The 3", 921,000 dot super-density LCD monitor with 170° viewing delivers bright, crisp image playback and precise Live View and movie shooting
This DSLR Body is a direct import item. Comes with a 1 year store warranty.
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7000 Digital SLR Camera 5 Lens Kit with 18-55mm VR, 70-300mm, 50mm, 52mm Wide Angle, 52mm 2X Telephoto, 16 GB and More
